fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies.CardValue

Packages that use CardValue
Package
Description
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards
Contains all components defining the different types of cards that are used in this game with their effects, as well as structures for easing their manipulation.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies
This package's purpose is to propose an all-in-one set of tools used to define CPU-controlled players' artificial intelligences,

  • Uses of CardValue in fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards

    Methods in fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards that return CardValue
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CardValue
    RumourCard.getDefaultValue()
    Creates a CardValue (used by CPU players' strategies to choose their actions) based on this Rumour card's values for its Witch? effect, for its Hunt! effect and for its additional effect, and on its boolean characteristics (risked, able to give cards, and/or offensive).
